00213     void WDFS( node inRoot , bool &thruRemoved , node_array<int> &theVisited , node_array<int> &theParent, int &thruPenaltyArcs){
00214 
00215         integer  theCycleLength, theMinWeight ;
00216         node theAdj , theStart , theEnd ;
00217         int j , i ;
00218         theVisited[ inRoot ] = DOING ;
00219 
00220 #ifdef DEBUG
00221         afile << "\tvisiting :: " ;
00222         afile << indexApm[inRoot] << " \n";
00223 
00224         afile << "\tcalled from  :: " ;
00225         afile <<  theParent[inRoot]<< " \n\n" ;
00226 #endif
00227 
00228         for( i = 0 ; i < AG.size() ; i++ ){
00229             theAdj = arrayApm[i];
00230             if ( IsArc_(inRoot,theAdj) ){
00231                 thruPenaltyArcs++;
00232             
00233                 if (theVisited[theAdj] == DOING) {
00234                     
00235                     theStart = inRoot ;
00236                     theEnd = theAdj ;
00237                     theMinWeight = Weight_( theStart , theEnd );
00238                     
00239                     for( j = indexApm[inRoot] ; j != i  ; j = theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ]  ){
00240 
00241                         if ( ! IsArc_( arrayApm [ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ] ] , arrayApm[j] ) )
00242                             break ;
00243                         if ( Weight_( arrayApm [ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ] ] , arrayApm[ j ] ) < theMinWeight ){
00244                             theMinWeight = Weight_( arrayApm [ theParent[ arrayApm[ j ] ] ] , arrayApm[j] );
00245                             theStart = arrayApm[ theParent [ arrayApm[j] ] ];
00246                             theEnd = arrayApm[j] ;
00247                         }
00248                     }
00249 
00250                     if ( j == i ) {
00251                         integer theCrossSE(mCross[theStart][theEnd]);
00252                         integer theCrossES(mCross[theEnd][theStart]);
00253 
00254                         thruRemoved = true ;
00255 
00256                         theCycleLength = 1 ;
00257 
00258                         for ( j = indexApm[inRoot] ; j != i ;  j = theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ]   ){
00259 
00260                             theCycleLength++;
00261                             mCross[ arrayApm[j] ] [ arrayApm[ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] ] ]  += theCrossSE ;
00262                             mCross[ arrayApm[ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] ] ] [ arrayApm[j] ]  += theCrossES ;
00263 
00264 #ifdef DEBUG
00265                         if(  Weight_(  arrayApm[ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] ] ,  arrayApm[ j ] ) == 0  )
00266                             afile << "---- Removed arc :: " << theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] << " , " << j << "of weight " << theMinWeight <<"\n\n" ;
00267 #endif    
00268                         }
00269                         mCross[theAdj][inRoot] += theCrossSE ;
00270                         mCross[inRoot][theAdj] += theCrossES ;
00271 #ifdef DEBUG
00272                     if (theStart==inRoot && theEnd==theAdj && Weight_(inRoot,theAdj) == 0 )
00273                           afile << "---Removed arc (" << indexApm[inRoot] <<" , " << indexApm[theAdj] << ") of weight " << theMinWeight << "\n" ;
00274                         
00275                     afile << "\t---Cycle length is ::" << theCycleLength << "\n";
00276                     printNodeMatrix(mCross , AG ) ;
00277 #endif
00278                     }
00279                 }
00280                 else if ( theVisited[theAdj] == NONE ){
00281                     theParent[theAdj] = indexApm[inRoot] ;
00282                     WDFS(theAdj,thruRemoved,theVisited,theParent,thruPenaltyArcs);
00283                 }
00284             }
00285     }
00286         
00287 #ifdef parent
00288         afile << "in wdfs :: " ;
00289         printNodeArray( theVisited , "the visited:: ") ;
00290 
00291         afile << "in wdfs :: " ;
00292         printNodeArray( theParent , "the parent :: ") ;
00293 #endif
00294 
00295         theVisited[inRoot] = DONE ;
00296     }
00297 
00298     void WDFSOrder ( node inRoot , node_array<int> &theVisited , int &inPosition ) {
00299             int theAdj ;
00300 
00301             theVisited[inRoot] = DONE;
00302 #ifdef DEBUG
00303             afile << "\tinposition :: " << inPosition << "\n";    
00304 #endif
00305 
00306 #ifdef parent
00307             afile << "in order :: " ;
00308             printNodeArray(theVisited , "theVisited : ");
00309 #endif
00310             for( theAdj = 0 ; theAdj < AG.size() ; theAdj++ ){
00311                 if( theVisited[ arrayApm[theAdj] ] == NONE && IsArc_(inRoot,arrayApm[theAdj]) )
00312                     WDFSOrder(arrayApm[theAdj] , theVisited , inPosition );
00313             }
00314             
00315             arrayApm2[ indexApm[inRoot] ] = arrayApm [ AG.size() -( inPosition ) - 1  ] ;
00316             // if ( inPosition < AG.size()-1 )
00317             inPosition++ ;
00318     }

00330     void index(){
00331         node n ;
00332         int i = 0 ;
00333         
00334         forall(n,AG){
00335             indexApm[n] = i ;
00336             i++;
00337         }
00338         i = 0 ;
00339         forall(n,AG){
00340             indexApm2[n] = i ;
00341             i++;
00342         }    
00343         i = 0 ;
00344         forall(n,BG){
00345             indexBpm[n] = i ;
00346             i++;
00347         }
00348 
00349         i = 0;
00350         forall(n,AG){
00351             arrayApm[i] = n ;
00352             i++;
00353         }
00354 
00355         i = 0 ;
00356         forall_nodes(n,Gpm){
00357             Gpm[n]=i ;
00358             i++;
00359         }
00360     }

00379     void pm() {
00380     
00381             integer originalCross , nowCross ;
00382             initGlobals();
00383             
00384             int thePenaltyArcs;
00385             bool theRemoved ;
00386             node_array<int> theVisited(Gpm) , theParent(Gpm) ;
00387             int  theSortCounter = 0  ;
00388             //float theStartTime = 0 ; //////
00389             index();
00390             theRuns = 0 ;
00391 #ifdef time         
00392             time_t t0 = time (0);
00393             // afile <<  "start time ::" << t0 << "\n";
00394 #endif
00395 #ifdef write
00396             writeToFileForPM(Gpm,AG,BG);    
00397 #endif
00398 //Repeat : //////
00399             afile << "********************************************\n" ;
00400             afile << "REPEAT " << theRuns << "\n";
00401             afile << "********************************************\n\n" ;
00402 
00403             thePenaltyArcs     = 0;
00404             //BuildCrossTable (Gpm,AG,mCross,indexBpm);
00405 
00406 #ifdef DEBUG
00407            
00408             afile << "indexApm at the start ::" ; // 0 1 2 3 4 5 die s�ral� oarak bas�cak initial cond.
00409             printOrder(indexApm);
00410                        
00411             printNodeMatrix( mCross , AG ); // initial cross table
00412             afile << "\nFirst Visit ::: \n" ;
00413 #endif
00414             theRemoved = false ;
00415             
00416             node n ;
00417             forall(n,AG){
00418                 theVisited[n] = NONE ;
00419                 theParent[n] = -1 ;
00420             }
00421             
00422             
00423             for(int i = 0 ; i < arrayApm.size() ; i++ ){
00424                 node n = arrayApm[i] ;
00425                 if ( theVisited[ n ] == NONE )
00426                     WDFS( n , theRemoved ,theVisited , theParent , thePenaltyArcs );
00427             }
00428                        
00429             while ( theRemoved == true ) {
00430 #ifdef DEBUG
00431                 afile << "\n\nNew Visit ::: \n" ;
00432 #endif    
00433                 theRemoved = false ;
00434                 
00435                 /* clear theVisited */
00436                 forall(n,AG){
00437                     theVisited[n] = NONE ;
00438                     theParent[n] = -1 ;
00439                 }
00440 
00441                 for(int i = 0 ; i < arrayApm.size() ; i++ ){
00442                     node n = arrayApm[i] ;
00443                     if ( theVisited[ n ] == NONE )
00444                         WDFS( n , theRemoved , theVisited , theParent , thePenaltyArcs );
00445                 }
00446             
00447             }
00448             theSortCounter = 0 ;
00449 
00450 #ifdef DEBUG
00451             afile << "\n\nLast Visit ::: \n" ;
00452 #endif            
00453             forall(n,AG){ // memset replacement
00454                 theVisited[n] = NONE ;
00455             }
00456 
00457             for(int i = 0 ; i < arrayApm.size() ; i++ ){
00458                 node n = arrayApm[i] ;
00459                 if ( theVisited[n] == NONE )
00460                     WDFSOrder( n , theVisited , theSortCounter );
00461             }
00462 
00463             
00464 #ifdef   parent    
00465              
00466             printNodeArray(theVisited , "\ntheVisited:: " );
00467             printNodeArray(theParent , "theParent :: " );
00468     
00469 
00470 #endif            
00471         
00472 #ifdef time             
00473             time_t t1 = time (0);
00474             
00475             //afile << "end time ::" << t1 << "\n";
00476 #endif
00477                         
00478             list<node> AAA ;
00479             index2();
00480             orderAG( AAA ) ;
00481             AG = AAA ;
00482                         /*GRAPH<int,int> GGG;
00483                         GGG.clear();
00484                         mCross.init(GGG);*/
00485 
00486 #ifdef DEBUG
00487              afile << "\nCross count with ( AAA ) :: " << nowCross << "\n\n" ;
00488         
00489 #endif                    
00490             // BuildCrossTable();
00491             //printNodeMatrix( mCross , AG );
00492 }

00499 void barycenter(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B){
00500     node_array<int> naiA_(G),naiB_(G);
00501     node_array<integer> nairBaryValues(G);
00502     node n,tn;
00503     edge e;
00504     int i,count;
00505     integer sum=0,weightSum=0;
00506 
00507     i = 0;
00508     forall( n, A ){
00509         naiA_[n] = i++;
00510     }
00511 
00512     i=1;
00513     forall( n, B ){
00514         naiB_[n] = i++;
00515     }
00516 
00517    
00518     forall(n,A){
00519         sum=0;
00520         count=0;
00521                 weightSum=0;
00522         forall_adj_edges(e,n){
00523             tn = G.target(e);
00524             sum += naiB_[tn]*G[e];
00525                         weightSum += G[e];
00526             count++;
00527         }
00528                 if ( count == 0 ){
00529                         nairBaryValues[n] = -1 ;
00530                 }else{
00531                         nairBaryValues[n] = sum;
00532                         nairBaryValues[n].operator *=(1000000);
00533                         nairBaryValues[n].operator /=(weightSum);
00534                 }
00535         }
00536 
00537     node minNode;
00538     list<node> temp = A ;
00539     list <node> tempResult ;
00540       
00541 
00542     for( int k=0 ; k < A.size() ; k++ ){   
00543         integer min = nairBaryValues[ temp.head() ] ;   
00544         minNode = temp.head();
00545         forall( n,temp ){
00546             if ( nairBaryValues[n] < min ){
00547                 min = nairBaryValues[n];
00548                 minNode = n ;
00549                
00550             }   
00551         }
00552         if( minNode != nil ){
00553             tempResult.append( minNode );
00554             temp.del_item( temp.search( minNode ) );
00555         }
00556     }   
00557 
00558     A = tempResult ;
00559 }
00560 
00561 #ifdef arda
00562 void buildCrossTable(GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node>& A, list<node>& B, node_matrix<integer>& nmdCrossTable){
00563         nmdCrossTable.init(G,0);
00564         edge eu,ev;
00565         node su,sv,tu,tv,n;
00566         node_array<int> naiA(G),naiB(G);
00567         integer temp;
00568         int i=0;
00569 
00570         forall(n,A){
00571                 naiA[n] = i++;
00572         }
00573         i=0;
00574         forall(n,B){
00575                 naiB[n] = i++;
00576         }
00577 
00578         i=0;
00579         forall_edges(eu,G){     
00580                 forall_edges(ev,G){
00581                         su = G.source(eu);
00582                         sv = G.source(ev);
00583                         tu = G.target(eu);
00584                         tv = G.target(ev);
00585                         
00586                         if ( eu == ev )
00587                                 break;
00588                         
00589                         if ( naiA[su] < naiA[sv] ){                                                     //u is before v
00590                                 temp = G[eu];
00591                                 temp *= G[ev];
00592                                 if ( naiB[tv] < naiB[tu] )                                              //do crossing?
00593                                         nmdCrossTable[su][sv] += temp;                          //yes
00594                                 else if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )
00595                                         nmdCrossTable[sv][su] += temp;                          //no
00596 
00597 
00598                         }else if ( naiA[su] > naiA[sv] ){                                       //v is before u
00599                                 temp = G[eu];
00600                                 temp *= G[ev];
00601                                 if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )                                              //do crossing?
00602                                         nmdCrossTable[sv][su] += temp;                          //yes
00603                                 else if ( naiB[tv] < naiB[tu] )
00604                                         nmdCrossTable[su][sv] += temp;                          //no
00605                         }
00606                 }
00607         }
00608 }

00612 void gre(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A, list<node> B, node_matrix<integer>& nmdCrossTable){
00613         node u,v;
00614         node_array<int> naiA(G);
00615         node_array<integer> allsumcuv(G);
00616         node_array<integer> allsummin(G);
00617         node_array<double> allrate(G);
00618         list<node> L,A_;
00619         int i;
00620         integer temp;
00621         
00622         i=0;
00623         forall(u,A){
00624                 naiA[u] = i++;
00625                 allsummin[u] = allsumcuv[u] = 0;
00626         }
00627 
00628         forall(u,A){
00629                 forall(v,A){
00630                         allsumcuv[u] += nmdCrossTable[u][v];
00631                         allsummin[u] += nmdCrossTable[u][v]<nmdCrossTable[v][u] ? nmdCrossTable[u][v] : nmdCrossTable[v][u];
00632                 
00633                 }
00634                  if ( allsumcuv[u] == 0 ){
00635                         allrate[u] = 0.0;
00636                 }else if ( allsummin[u] == 0 ){
00637                         allrate[u] = MAXDOUBLE;
00638                 }else{
00639                         temp = allsumcuv[u];
00640                         temp.operator *=(1000000);
00641                         temp.operator /=(allsummin[u]);
00642                         
00643                         allrate[u] = (double)(temp.to_double() / 1000000);
00644                         //allrate[u] = temp;
00645                 }
00646                  //cout << naiA[u] << "\t" << allrate[u] << "\n";
00647                 
00648         }
00649         //cout << "\n\n\n";
00650 
00651         A_=L=A;
00652         A.clear();
00653         list_item itu,itv;
00654         while ( !L.empty() ){
00655                 itu = L.first();
00656                 u = L[itu];
00657                 if ( L.size() > 1 ){
00658                         for(itv = L.succ(itu); itv != nil; itv = L.succ(itv)){
00659                                 v = L[itv];
00660                                 if ( allrate[v] == -1 ){
00661                                         u = v;
00662                                         itu = itv;
00663                                         break;
00664                                 }
00665                                 if ( allrate[v] < allrate[u] ){
00666                                         u = v;
00667                                         itu = itv;
00668                                 }
00669                         }
00670                 }
00671 
00672                 A.append(u);
00673                 L.del_item(itu);
00674                 //cout << "\n -- " << naiA[u] << "\t" << allrate[u] << "\n";
00675 
00676                 forall(v,L){
00677                         allsumcuv[v] -= nmdCrossTable[v][u];
00678                         allsummin[v] -= nmdCrossTable[u][v]<nmdCrossTable[v][u] ? nmdCrossTable[u][v] : nmdCrossTable[v][u];
00679                         if ( allsumcuv[v] == 0 ){
00680                                 allrate[v] = 0.0;
00681                         }else if ( allsummin[v] == 0 ){
00682                                 allrate[v] = MAXDOUBLE;
00683                         }else{
00684                                 temp = allsumcuv[v];
00685                                 temp.operator *=(1000000);
00686                                 temp.operator /=(allsummin[v]);
00687                                 
00688 
00689                                 allrate[v] = (double)(temp.to_double() / 1000000);
00690                                 //allrate[v] = temp;
00691                         }
00692                         //cout << naiA[v] << "\t" << allrate[v] << "\n";        
00693                 }
00694                 //cout << "\n\n";
00695         }
00696         
00697         
00698 
00699 }
00700 
00701 
00702 void median(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> B){
00703     node_array<list<node> > medianPartitions(G);
00704 
00705     list<node> freePartition;
00706     list<node> tempA;
00707     list<edge> elist;
00708 
00709     node n=nil;
00710 
00711     edge e1=nil;
00712 
00713     long sum, median_sum;
00714     
00715     forall(n,A){
00716         sum = 0;
00717         median_sum = 0;
00718 
00719         elist = G.out_edges( n );
00720         forall(e1,elist){
00721             sum += G[e1];
00722         }
00723 
00724         //after iteration e1 is the median
00725         forall(e1,elist){
00726             median_sum += G[e1];
00727             if ( median_sum < sum/2 ){
00728             }else{
00729                 break;
00730             }
00731         }
00732 
00733         //if no node has no edge, we add it to freee partition which will not need to be sorted (using barycenter)
00734         if ( elist.size() == 0 ){
00735             freePartition.append(n);
00736         }else{
00737             medianPartitions[G.target(e1)].append(n);
00738         }
00739     }
00740 
00741     A.clear();
00742     A.conc(freePartition);
00743 
00744     forall(n,B){
00745         if ( medianPartitions[n].size() ){
00746             barycenter(G,medianPartitions[n],B);
00747             A.conc(medianPartitions[n]);
00748         }
00749     }
00750 
00751 }
00752 
00753 void assignWeight(matrix &m, int sumOfWeight, int weightBalance){
00754     int row=m.dim1(),col=m.dim2();
00755     int i,j,w;
00756     list<point> edges;
00757     leda::random_source S;
00758     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
00759         for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
00760             if ( m(i,j) != (double)0.0 ){
00761                 point p((double)i,(double)j);
00762                 edges.append(p);
00763             }
00764         }
00765     }
00766 
00767         edges.permute();
00768 
00769     point p;
00770     sumOfWeight -= edges.size();
00771     while ( sumOfWeight > 0 && edges.size() > 0 ){
00772         forall (p,edges){
00773             if ( sumOfWeight < weightBalance*2 ){
00774                 m((int)p.X(),(int)p.Y()) += sumOfWeight;
00775                 sumOfWeight = 0;
00776                 break;
00777             }else{
00778                 S >> w;
00779                 w %= (sumOfWeight/weightBalance);
00780                 m((int)p.X(),(int)p.Y()) += w;
00781                 
00782                 sumOfWeight -= w;
00783             }
00784         }
00785 
00786     }
00787 }

00789 void randomUnweightedGraph(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B, int aCount, int bCount, double ed, int seedValue){
00790         int i,j;
00791         array<node> A_(aCount),B_(bCount);
00792         node n;
00793         random_source S(31);
00794         double r;
00795         
00796         S.set_seed(seedValue);
00797         S.set_range(0,1);
00798         
00799         for( i=0 ; i<aCount ; i++ ){
00800                 n = G.new_node();
00801                 A.append(n);
00802                 A_[i] = n;
00803                 
00804         }
00805         for( i=0 ; i<bCount ; i++ ){
00806                 n = G.new_node();
00807                 B.append(n);
00808                 B_[i] = n;
00809         }
00810         
00811         for ( i=0 ; i<aCount ; i++ ){
00812                 for ( j=0 ; j<bCount ; j++ ){
00813                         S >> r;
00814                         if ( r < ed ){
00815                                 G.new_edge(A_[i],B_[j]);
00816                         }
00817                 }
00818         }
00819 
00820 }

00822 void randomGraph2(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B, int aCount, int bCount, double edgeDensity, int aw, int weightBalance){
00823         G.clear();
00824         A.clear();
00825         B.clear();
00826         
00827     leda::random_source S;
00828     matrix m(aCount,bCount);
00829     int i,j;
00830     int max = 1;
00831         int sumOfWeight = calculateSumOfWeight(aCount,bCount,(int)(edgeDensity*1000),aw);
00832     S.set_range(0,max);
00833     double d;
00834 
00835     //cout << "Edge Density: " << edgeDensity << "\n";
00836     for ( i=0 ; i<aCount ; i++ ){
00837         for ( j=0 ; j<bCount ; j++ ){
00838             S >> d;
00839             d = d / (double)max;
00840             //cout << "D: " << d << "\n";
00841             if ( d < edgeDensity ){
00842                 m(i,j) = 1.0;
00843             }else{
00844                 m(i,j) = 0.0;
00845             }
00846         }
00847     }
00848 
00849         if ( aw > 1 )
00850                 assignWeight(m,sumOfWeight,weightBalance);
00851     m2g(G,A,B,m,true);
00852    
00853 }

00923 
00924 int calculateSumOfWeight(int a, int b, int cn, int averageWeight){
00925     int edges = a*b*(cn%1001)/1000 + 1;
00926     return edges*averageWeight;
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 integer crossingNumber(matrix &m){
00931     integer crossingCount = 0,temp;
00932     int i,j;
00933     int col,row;
00934     col = m.dim2();
00935     row = m.dim1();
00936     //double d=0.0; //////
00937         double temp2;
00938     matrix mc(row,col);
00939 
00940     
00941     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
00942         mc(i,col-1) = 0.0;
00943     }
00944 
00945     for ( i=0 ; i<col ; i++ ){
00946         mc(0,i) = 0.0;
00947     }
00948 
00949     double areaA,areaB,areaC;
00950     for ( i=1 ; i<=row-1 ; i++ ){
00951         for ( j=col-2 ; j>=0 ; j-- ){
00952             //mc(i,j) = m(i-1,j+1) + mc(i,j+1) + mc(i-1,j);
00953             areaA = areaB = areaC = 0.0;
00954             areaA = mc(i,j+1);
00955             areaB = mc(i-1,j);
00956             areaC = mc(i-1,j+1);
00957             temp2=m(i-1,j+1);
00958             mc(i,j) = (areaB-areaC) + (areaA-areaC) + areaC +  temp2;
00959             temp = mc(i,j)*m(i,j);
00960             crossingCount.operator +=(temp);           
00961 
00962         }
00963     }
00964 
00965     return crossingCount;
00966 }
00967 
00968 integer crossingNumber(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B){
00969     matrix m=g2m(G,A,B,true);
00970     return crossingNumber(m);
00971 }
00972 
00973 matrix g2m(GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node> A, list<node> B, bool weighted=true){
00974     int i,j;
00975     int row=A.size(),col=B.size();
00976     matrix m(row,col);
00977     node_array<int> A1(G),B1(G);
00978 
00979     edge e;
00980     node n;
00981     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
00982         for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
00983             m(i,j) = (double)0;
00984         }
00985     }
00986     i=0;
00987     forall(n,A){
00988         A1[n] = i;
00989         i++;
00990     }
00991 
00992     i=0;
00993     forall(n,B){
00994         B1[n] = i;
00995         i++;
00996     }
00997 
00998     node sn,tn;
00999     forall_edges(e,G){
01000         sn = G.source(e);
01001         tn = G.target(e);
01002 
01003         if ( weighted ){
01004             m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = G[e];
01005         }else{
01006             m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) + (double)1.0;
01007         }
01008     }
01009 
01010     return m;
01011 }

01016 void m2g(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B, matrix &m, bool weighted=true){
01017         /*
01018          * weight e�er false verilirse, weight'� 5 olan bi edge', 5 defa teker teker ekler. Bu durumda edgein xtype integer de�eri s�f�r olarak atan�r. B�R OLARAK DE��L!!!
01019          * weight'in default de�eri true'dur, yani weight arguman� verilmez ise, weight true olarak set edilir. Bu durumda yarat�lan graphda, duplicate edgeler olmaz,
01020          *     Ayn� source ve target'a sahip ka� edge varsa, sadece 1 tane edge olarak eklenir ve o edge'in xtype'� duplication say�s�na ayarlan�r.
01021          * Arguman olarak verilen Graph, �st layer node listesi (A), ve alt layer node listesi(B) i�ersinde bulunan b�t�n elemanlar temizlenir.
01022          */
01023     int i,j;
01024     int k;
01025     int row=m.dim1(),col=m.dim2();
01026     array<node> A1(row),B1(col);
01027     edge e;
01028     node sn,tn;
01029     A.clear();
01030     B.clear();
01031     G.clear();
01032 
01033     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01034         sn = G.new_node();
01035         A1[i] = sn;
01036         A.append(sn);
01037     }
01038 
01039     for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01040         tn = G.new_node();
01041         B1[j] = tn;
01042         B.append(tn);
01043     }
01044 
01045     if ( weighted ){
01046         for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01047             for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01048                 if ( (int)m(i,j) != 0 ){
01049                     e = G.new_edge(A1[i],B1[j],(int)m(i,j));
01050                     G[e] = (int)m(i,j);
01051                 }
01052             }
01053         }
01054     }else{
01055         for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01056             for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01057                 for ( k=0 ; k<(int)m(i,j) ; k++ ){
01058                         e = G.new_edge(A1[i],B1[j]);
01059                         G[e] = 0;
01060                 }
01061             }
01062         }
01063     }
01064 }

01070 void drawBipartite(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> A, list<node> B){
01071     double initialX = 100 , initialY = 100 , incX = 100 , incY = 100 ,i;
01072     node_array<double> x(G),y(G) ;
01073 
01074     GraphWin gw(G);
01075     
01076     i = initialX ;
01077 
01078     node n ;
01079     forall(n,B){
01080         x[n] = i ;    
01081         i += incX  ;
01082         y[n] = initialY ;
01083     }
01084 
01085     i = initialX ;
01086     forall(n,A){
01087         x[n] = i ;    
01088         i += incX  ;
01089         y[n] = initialY + incY ;
01090     }
01091 
01092     
01093     gw.set_node_height(30,true);
01094     gw.set_position(x,y);
01095     gw.set_animation_steps(3);
01096     gw.set_edge_label_type(leda::data_label , true);
01097     
01098 
01099     gw.display();
01100     gw.zoom_graph();
01101     gw.edit();
01102 }

01107 void wolf(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> B){
01108     int i,j,k,neighbourWeight;
01109     int leftsum=0,rightsum=0;
01110     
01111     node n=nil;
01112     edge e=nil;
01113    
01114     array<node> anB(B.size()+1);
01115     array<node> partitionOwners(B.size()+1);
01116     
01117     array<list<node> > partitionMembers(B.size()+1);
01118     
01119     list<node> newA;
01120     list<node> temp,temp2;
01121     list<node> newAA;
01122 
01123     list<edge> elist;
01124     
01125     node_array<int> naiB(G);
01126     node_array<int> naiA(G);
01127     
01128     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << "\n\nWOLF PH1 STARTS\n---------------------\n";
01129 
01130     i=0;
01131     forall(n,A){
01132         naiA[n] = i++;
01133     }
01134     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
01135     cout << "A:\n"; i=0; forall(n,A) cout << i << "\t" << n << "\n";
01136     cout << "naiA:\n"; forall(n,A) cout << "naiA[" << n << "]\t" << naiA[n] << "\n";
01137     }
01138 
01139     i=1;
01140     forall(n,B){
01141         naiB[n] = i;
01142         anB[i] = n;
01143         i++;
01144     }
01145     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
01146     cout << "B:\n"; i=0; forall(n,B) cout << i << "\t" << n << "\n";
01147     cout << "naiB:\n"; forall(n,B) cout << "naiB[" << n << "]\t" << naiB[n] << "\n";
01148     cout << "anB:\n"; for ( i=0 ; i<B.size()+1 ; i++ ) cout << "anB[" << i << "]\t" << anB[i] << "\n";
01149     }
01150     partitionOwners = anB;
01151 
01152 
01153     forall(n,A){
01155         // S O R T  N E I G H B O U R S //
01156         //                              //
01157         //                              //
01159 
01160 
01161         elist = G.adj_edges(n);
01162         leftsum=0;
01163         rightsum=0;
01164         forall(e,elist){
01165             rightsum += G[e];
01166         }
01167 
01168         /*for( list_item loop_it = elist.first() ; it = loop_it, loop_it = elist.succ(loop_it) ; it ){
01169         }*/
01170 
01171         k=0;
01172         list_item it;
01173         forall_items(it,elist){
01174             e = elist[it];
01175             
01176             k=naiB[G.target(e)]-1;
01177 
01178             rightsum -= G[e];
01179             if ( leftsum >= rightsum ){
01180                 break;
01181             }
01182 
01183             leftsum += G[e];
01184             if ( elist.succ(it) && naiB[G.target(e)] + 1 == naiB[G.target(elist[elist.succ(it)])] ){
01185                 neighbourWeight = G[elist[elist.succ(it)]];
01186             }else{
01187                 neighbourWeight = 0;
01188             }
01189             if ( leftsum >= rightsum - neighbourWeight ){
01190                 k++;
01191                 break;
01192             }
01193         }
01194 
01195         partitionMembers[k].append(n);
01196 
01197     }
01198 
01199     
01200     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
01201     cout << "Partition Members\n";
01202     }
01203     for ( i=0 ; i<partitionMembers.size() ; i++ ){
01204         temp = partitionMembers[i];
01205         if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
01206         cout << i << "\t=> "; temp.print();cout << "\n";
01207         }
01208     }
01209 
01210     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
01211     j=0; forall(n,A) cout << j++ << " => " << n << "\t";
01212     }
01213     
01214 
01215     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << "0. Part -> ";
01216     forall(n,partitionMembers[0]){
01217         //G[n] = naiA[n];
01218         if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << n << " ";
01219         newA.append(n);
01220     }
01221 
01222     
01223     partitionCount=0;
01224     for ( i=1 ; i<partitionMembers.size() ; i++ ){
01225         temp = partitionMembers[i];
01226         
01227         if ( !temp.empty() ){
01228             partitionCount++;
01229         }
01230         if ( justRunPhase1 == 1 ){
01231         }else{
01232             if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
01233             cout << "("<< i <<") Before: "; temp.print(); cout << "\n";
01234             }
01235             
01236             wolfPhase2( G , temp , partitionOwners[i], B );
01237             if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
01238             cout << "("<< i <<") After: "; temp.print(); cout << "\n";
01239             }
01240 
01241             forall(n,temp){
01242                 //G[n] = naiA[n];
01243                 cout << "";
01244                 newA.append(n);
01245             }
01246         }
01247     }
01248     
01249     A= newA;
01250 }
01251 
01252 integer weight(GRAPH<int,int> &G, node alt1, node alt2, node ust, list<node> alt){
01253     integer sum=0;
01254     int start=0,end=0,i;
01255 
01256     node n;
01257     list<edge> outedges = G.adj_edges(ust);
01258     edge e;
01259     node_array<int> alt_(G);
01260 
01261     if ( alt1 == nil ){
01262         return 0;
01263     }
01264 
01265     i=0;
01266     forall(n,alt){
01267         alt_[n] = i;
01268         if ( n == alt1 ){
01269             start = i;
01270         }
01271         if ( n == alt2 ){
01272             end = i;
01273         }
01274         i++;
01275     }
01276 
01277 
01278     forall(e,outedges){
01279         n = G.target(e);
01280         if ( alt_[n] >= start && alt_[n] <= end ){
01281             sum.operator +=(G[e]);
01282         }
01283     }
01284 
01285     return sum;
01286 }
01287 
01288 void merge(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &ptRow, list<node> &L, list<node> &R, node owner, list<node> &alt){
01289        int i=0 , j=0 ,k=0 ;
01290        int rsize,lsize;
01291        integer ul,vl,ur,vr ;
01292        node ownerNext ;
01293        list_item it;
01294        ptRow.clear();
01295 
01296        rsize= R.size();
01297        lsize = L.size();
01298 
01299        for ( i=0 ; i < lsize + rsize ; i++ ){
01300             if( k < rsize && j < lsize  ){ // bu conditionlar dogru mu ? kontrol 2
01301                 it = alt.search(owner);
01302                 it = alt.succ(it);
01303 
01304                 if ( it )
01305                     ownerNext = alt[it];
01306                 else
01307                     ownerNext = nil;
01308                    
01309                 vr = weight(G    ,ownerNext            ,alt.tail()        ,R[R.get_item(k)]    ,alt    ) ; // bunun owner olmas� laz�m index0 oldugu i�in
01310                 vl = weight(G    ,alt.head()            ,owner            ,R[R.get_item(k)]    ,alt    ) ; // bunun da owner-1 index 0 dan baslad�g� i�in
01311                 ul = weight(G    ,alt.head()            ,owner            ,L[L.get_item(j)]    ,alt    ) ; // yoksa �le diil mi ? :=) , owner �n sadece sola
01312                 ur = weight(G    ,ownerNext            ,alt.tail()        ,L[L.get_item(j)]    ,alt    ) ;   // yani vl ve ul ye dahil olmnas� laz�m di�erine diil
01313                 //cout << "\nvl*ur : " << vl*ur << "\t" << "vr*ul : " << vr*ul  << "\n"  ;  
01314 
01315                 if (   ( ur*vl ) <= ( vr*ul )   ){
01316                     
01317                     ptRow.append( L[L.get_item(j)] );    
01318                     j++;
01319                     //cout << "\ncondition 1 \n" ;
01320                     //ptRow.print();
01321                     //cout << "\n";
01322                 }else {
01323                     
01324                     ptRow.append( R[R.get_item(k)] );
01325                     k++;
01326                     //cout << "\ncondition 2 \n" ;
01327                     //ptRow.print();
01328                     //cout << "\n";
01329                 }
01330 
01331             }else if ( k >= rsize && j < lsize ){
01332                 ptRow.append( L[L.get_item(j)] );    
01333                 j++;
01334                 //cout << "\ncondition 3 \n" ;
01335                 //ptRow.print();
01336                 //cout << "\n";
01337 
01338            }else if ( j >= lsize && k < rsize ){
01339                 ptRow.append( R[R.get_item(k)] );
01340                 k++;
01341                 //cout << "\ncondition 4 \n" ;   
01342                 //ptRow.print();
01343                 //cout << "\n";
01344            }
01345             
01346         }
01347        
01348 }
01349 
01350 void wolfPhase2(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &ptRow, node owner ,list<node> alt){
01351     int size = ptRow.size();
01352     int half = (int)size/2 ;
01353     list<node> R, L;
01354        
01355     if ( ptRow.size() == 1 || ptRow.size() == 0 ){
01356         return ;
01357     }else {
01358         ptRow.split(ptRow[half],L,R );  
01359         wolfPhase2( G , L , owner , alt );
01360         wolfPhase2( G , R , owner , alt );
01361         merge ( G, ptRow, L , R , owner , alt) ;
01362     }
01363 }

01370 void readFromFile(list<node>& A, list<node>& B, char *filename){
01371     //ifstream pmin( "F:\\Projects\\PM\\pro77" , ios::in ) ;
01372         ifstream pmin( filename , ios::in ) ;
01373 
01374     int source  , target , nodeA ,nodeB ;
01375                 
01376     pmin >> nodeA ;
01377     pmin >> nodeB ;
01378     matrix mpm(nodeA,nodeB) ;
01379     
01380     while ( ! pmin.eof() ){
01381 
01382         pmin >> source ;
01383         pmin >> target ;
01384 
01385         mpm[source][target - nodeA ] = 1 ;
01386     }
01387     m2g(Gpm,A,B,mpm,true);
01388 
01389     pmin.close();
01390 }

01392 void writeToFileForPM(list<node>& A, list<node>& B, char *filename){
01393     //char file[1024];
01394         //sprintf(file,"F:\\Projects\\PM\\%s",filename);
01395         pmfile.open(filename);
01396     list<edge> out ; 
01397     edge e ;
01398     node n ;
01399     
01400     pmfile << A.size() << " " << B.size() << "\n";
01401 
01402     forall( n , A ){
01403         out = Gpm.out_edges(n) ;
01404         
01405         
01406         forall ( e , out ){
01407                 pmfile << indexApm[ Gpm.source(e)] << " " << A.size() + indexBpm[ Gpm.target(e)] << "\n" ;
01408         }
01409

01411         
01412     pmfile.close();
01413 }
01414 
01415 
01416 double divide(integer c, integer lower){
01417         if ( c==0 && lower!=0 ){
01418                 //Not possible
01419                 return 1.0;
01420         }
01421         
01422         if ( c==0 && lower==0 ){
01423                 return 1.0;
01424         }
01425         
01426         if ( c!=0 && lower==0 ){
01427                 return c.to_double();
01428         }
01429         
01430         if ( c!=0 && lower!=0 ){
01431                 c.operator *=(1000000);
01432                 c /= lower;
01433                 return c.to_double()/1000000;
01434         }
01435 }
01436 
01437 void readFromGraphBase(string filename, GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node>& A, list<node>& B){
01438         int n0,n1,i;
01439         int rvertices=1,rarcs=2,rinfo=0;
01440         list<string> vertices,arcs;
01441         int read_where=rinfo;
01442         string line(""),temp;
01443         list_item it;
01444         edge e;
01445         int sourceVertex,destVertex,nextArc,weight;
01446         node nsource,ndest;
01447         
01448         file_istream fp(filename);
01449 
01450         G.clear();
01451         A.clear();
01452         B.clear();
01453         
01454         //cout << "Inits are done!!!\n";
01455         
01456         
01457         //cout << "Reading info...\n";
01458         while(!line.contains("* Vertices")){
01459                 line.read_line(fp);
01460                 //cout << "\t" << line << "\n";
01461                 if ( line.head(16) == "\"random_bigraph(" ){
01462                         temp = line.tail(line.length()-16);
01463                         sscanf(temp,"%d%*c%d",&n0,&n1);
01464                 }
01465         }
01466         //cout << "DONE\n";
01467 
01468         
01469         //cout << "Reading vertices...\n";
01470         //read vertices
01471         while(!line.contains("* Arcs")){
01472                 line.read_line(fp);
01473                 vertices.append(line);
01474         }
01475         //cout << "Last vertice line: " << vertices.tail() << "\n";
01476         vertices.del_item(vertices.last());
01477         //cout << "DONE\n";
01478 
01479         //cout << "Replacements over vertices...\n";
01480         forall_items(it,vertices){
01481                 line = vertices[it];
01482 
01483                 line = line.replace_all("\"\"","-1");
01484                 line = line.del_all("\"");
01485                 line = line.del_all("A");
01486                 line = line.replace_all(","," ");
01487                 vertices[it] = line;
01488         }
01489         //cout << "DONE\n";
01490 
01491         
01492         //cout << "Reading arcs...\n";
01493         //read arcs
01494         while(line.head(10) != "* Checksum"){
01495                 line.read_line(fp);
01496                 arcs.append(line);
01497         }
01498         arcs.del_item(arcs.last());
01499         //cout << "DONE\n";
01500 
01501         
01502         //cout << "Replacements over arcs...\n";
01503         forall_items(it,arcs){
01504                 line = arcs[it];
01505 
01506                 line = line.del_all("V");
01507                 line = line.replace_all("0,0,0","-1 -1 -1");
01508                 line = line.replace_all(",0,",",-1,");
01509                 line = line.replace_all(","," ");
01510                 line = line.del_all("A");
01511                 arcs[it] = line;
01512         }
01513         //cout << "DONE\n";
01514 
01515 
01516         //cout << "Arrengements started...\n";
01517         array<string> arcs_(arcs.size());
01518         i=0;
01519         forall(line,arcs){
01520                 arcs_[i++] = line;
01521         }
01522         //cout << "DONE\n";
01523         
01524 
01525         //cout << "Creating nodes...\n";
01526         array<node> allnodes(n0+n1);
01527         for(i=0;i<n0+n1;i++){
01528                 allnodes[i] = G.new_node();
01529                 if ( i<n0 ){
01530                         A.append(allnodes[i]);
01531                 }else{
01532                         B.append(allnodes[i]);
01533                 }
01534         }
01535         //cout << "DONE\n";
01536 
01537 
01538         //cout << "Creating edges...\n";
01539         i=0;
01540         forall(line,vertices){
01541                 sscanf(line,"%d%d",&sourceVertex,&nextArc);
01542                 //cout << "\t" << sourceVertex << " creating...\t";
01543                 nsource = allnodes[sourceVertex];
01544 
01545                 if ( i==n0 ){
01546                         break;
01547                 }
01548                 i++;
01549                 while ( nextArc != -1 ){
01550                         line = arcs_[nextArc];
01551                         sscanf(line,"%d%d%d",&destVertex,&nextArc,&weight);
01552                         ndest = allnodes[destVertex];
01553 
01554                         e = G.new_edge(nsource,ndest);
01555                         G[e] = weight;
01556                 }
01557 
01558 
01559                 //cout << "[DONE]\n";
01560         }
01561         //cout << "DONE\n";
01562 }
01563 
01564 
01565 void luBound(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B, node_matrix<integer>& nmdCrossTable, integer& lower, integer& upper){
01566     integer uv,vu;
01567     node u,v ;
01568         lower=0;
01569         upper=0;
01570 
01571         forall(u,A){
01572                 forall(v,A){
01573                         if ( u==v ){
01574                                 break;
01575                         }
01576                         
01577                         uv = nmdCrossTable[u][v];
01578                         vu = nmdCrossTable[v][u];
01579                         if ( uv > vu ){
01580                                 lower += vu;
01581                                 upper += uv;
01582                         }else{
01583                                 lower += uv;
01584                                 upper += vu;
01585                         }
01586 
01587                 }
01588         }
01589     
01590 }

01597         forall( n1 , A ){

01601     }

01614 double expon(double mean, random_source &rs){
01615         double u ;
01616         rs >> u ;
01617         double u2=-1.0/mean* log(1-u);
01618         cout << u2;
01619         return u2;
01620 }

01622 
01623 double poisson(double lambda,random_source &rs){
01624         double l = exp(-lambda);
01625         int k=0;
01626         double p=1,u;
01627                 
01628         do{
01629                 k++;
01630                 rs >> u;
01631                 p*=u;
01632         }while(p>=l);
01633         
01634         return k-1;
01635 }
01636 
01637 double geometric(double p, random_source &rs){
01638         double u;
01639         rs >> u;
01640         if( p == 1 )
01641                 return 1.0;
01642         else
01643                 return log(u)/log(1.0-p)+1.0; 
01644 }
01645 
01646 list <double> randGaussian(double mean , double variance, random_source &rs){
01647         
01648     double v1,v2,s,x,y,u1,u2 ;
01649 
01650     do{
01651         rs >> u1 ;
01652         rs >> u2 ;
01653 
01654         v1 = 2*u1 -1 ;
01655         v2 = 2*u2 -1 ;
01656 
01657         s = pow(v1,2) + pow(v2,2) ;
01658 
01659     }while( s>=1 );
01660 
01661     x= sqrt(-2 * log(s) / s) * v1 ;
01662     y= sqrt(-2 * log(s) / s) * v2 ;
01663     
01664     x = mean + sqrt(variance) * x ;
01665     y = mean + sqrt(variance) * y ;
01666             
01667     list<double> rvs;
01668     rvs.append(x) ;
01669     rvs.append(y) ;
01670     
01671     cout << "\trG=> " << mean << ", " << variance << " == " << "(" << x << "," << y << ")";
01672     //rvs.print();
01673     cout << "\n";
01674 
01675     return rvs;
01676 }
01677 
01678 
01679 list <double> randGaussian2(double mean, double variance, random_source &rs){    
01680     double x,y,u1,u2 ;
01681 
01682     do{
01683         rs >> u1 ;
01684     }while( u1 == 0 );
01685     rs >> u2 ;
01686     
01687     x=sqrt(-2 * log(u1)) * cos(2*PI * u2);
01688     y=sqrt(-2 * log(u1)) * sin(2*PI * u2);
01689     
01690     x = mean + sqrt(variance) * x ;
01691     y = mean + sqrt(variance) * y ;
01692             
01693     list<double> rvs;
01694     rvs.append(x) ;
01695     rvs.append(y) ;
01696 
01697     return rvs;
01698 }
01699 
01700 int erlang (double mean, int r, random_source &rs){
01701         double sum=0;
01702         for( int i=0 ; i<r ; i++ ){
01703                 sum += expon(mean,rs);
01704         }
01705         sum = sum*(double)10.0 + (double)1.0;
01706         //sum = sum * (double) 10.0 + 1;
01707         return (int)sum ;       
01708 }

01718         }

01985 /*void split(const std::string& str, list<list<int> >& output, const string& delimiters = ","){
01986     output.clear();
01987     // Skip delimiters at beginning.
01988     std::string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
01989     // Find first "non-delimiter".
01990     std::string::size_type pos     = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
01991     int i;
01992     int elemCount=0;
01993     list<int> temp;
01994     while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos){
01995         // Found a token, add it to the vector.
01996         sscanf(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos).c_str(),"%d",&i);
01997         temp.append(i);
01998         elemCount++;
01999         if ( elemCount == 2 ){
02000             elemCount=0;
02001             output.append(temp);

02030 /*void BuildCrossTableUnweighted(GRAPH<int,int>& G,list<node>& A__,node_matrix<integer>& crossTable_,node_array<int>& naiB__){
02031         //Unweighted version of Building Cross Table
02032         
02033         node u,v ;
02034         edge eu,ev;
02035     list<edge> outU ;
02036     list<edge> outV ;
02037         list_item itu,itv;

02039         node_array<list<edge> > adjEdges(G);
02040         double count;
02041         int moreedge;
02042 
02043         forall(u,A__){
02044                 degree[u] = 0;
02045                 forall_adj_edges(eu,u){
02046                         degree[u] += G[eu];
02047                 }
02048         }
02049 
02050 
02051         for (itu = A__.first() ; itu ; itu = A__.succ(itu) ){
02052                 u = A__[itu];
02053 
02054                 if ( !G.first_adj_edge(u) || !A__.succ(itu) ) continue;
02055 
02056                 for (itv = A__.succ(itu) ; itv ; itv = A__.succ(itv) ){
02057                         v = A__[itv];
02058                         crossTable_[u][v] = crossTable_[v][u] = 0;
02059 
02060                         forall_adj_edges(eu,u){
02061                                 moreedge=0;
02062                                 count = 0;
02063                                 forall_adj_edges(ev,v){
02064                                         //edges cross each other?
02065                                         if ( naiB__[G.target(ev)] < naiB__[G.target(eu)] ){ 
02066                                                 count += G[ev];
02067                                         }else{
02068                                                 moreedge=1;
02069                                                 break;
02070                                         }
02071                                 }
02072 
02073                                 crossTable_[u][v] +=(count * G[eu]);
02074 
02075                                 if ( moreedge == 0 || naiB__[G.target(ev)] > naiB__[G.target(eu)] ){
02076                                         crossTable_[v][u] += (degree[v] - count) * G[eu];
02077                                 }else{
02078                                         crossTable_[v][u] += (degree[v] - count - G[ev]) * G[eu];
02079                                 }                                       
02080                         }
02081                 }
02082         }
02083 
02084 
02085 }*/
